alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 20 at 4:09AM CDT until May 21 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W affecting Hansford County. For the Palo Duro Creek...including Spearman 6W...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Moderate overbank flooding occurs. Cattle are threatened and damage to fences is possible * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 14.5 feet this morning. It will then fall to 5.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 5.6 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall again and remain below flood stage. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 415 PM CDT.
